mapper.select: SELECT ID, DEPLOY_STAGE, DEPLOY_STATE, SCENARIO_NAME, BUILD_TARGET, DEPLOY_FROM, DEPLOY_TO, EXECUTION_DATE FROM DEPLOY_HISTORY ORDER BY ID LIMIT #{pageCount} OFFSET ((#{page} - 1) * #{pageCount})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DEPLOY_HISTORY(DEPLOY_STAGE, DEPLOY_STATE, SCENARIO_NAME, BUILD_TARGET, DEPLOY_FROM, DEPLOY_TO, EXECUTION_DATE) VALUES (#{deployStage}, #{deployState}, #{scenarioName}, #{buildTarget}, #{deployFrom}, #{deployTo}, #{executionDate})
